PathOfBuilding.Notes:
mana cost : 79 * 5 aps = 395 mana/s mana solutions : - mana leech : (20% * 900 = 180 mana/s) - impossible a part mana leech support (disponible sur shaper gloves) - 2-3 mana on hit ring : (3 * 8 proj * 2 echo = 48 mana, * 5 aps = 240 mana/s) - mana flask : 80/s
combo : - bane curses - frost bomb - VRF - flasks - ice spear - vaal discipline quand on prend un coup pour pouvoir continuer a spam
peut switch l'ascendancy pour aller chercher Void Beacon + Frigid Wake pour etre immunise au Chill et Freeze en plus ca reduit leur dmg + t'as une chance de les freeze la difference de dps est minime, mais profane bloom aide au clear tandis que frigid wake chill/freeze immunity est vrm op vs Shaper / Elder / Shelder
Focus : - (29-36)% chance to deal Double Damage while Focussed - Shock nearby Enemies for 4 Seconds when you Focus - Skills Cost no Mana while Focussed - Trigger Socketed Spells when you Focus
issues : - arcane surge - mana leech - skill for this : frost bomb, storm brand, flame dash - cwdt, mana leech, storm brand ? - flame dash, faster, bomb, asurge ?
Items : Energy from Within jewel : when transitioning, use this to convert life to es in the slot above witch if possible The Dark Seer : life + es per level * 2 Chest avec beaucoup d'ES sans low life en attendant d'avoir shav et shav 6L Staff 6L ?
Levling : Frost Bomb + Vortex alternating for each pack. Also very easy passive damage against bosses. And you can use Winter Orb or Ice Spear on top of those for bosses. Can even go IceSpear+Unleash burst Low-Life lorica going es from the start ?? would be insane dmg
Bossing : Explosive trap
